props.modelValue: Set v-model to true to show modal or false to hide it. Model is optional if dropdown is activated from v-trigger component
props.title: Title displayed in modal header
props.primaryButton: Attributes of primary v-button component. See documentation for valid values
props.secondaryButton: Attributes of secondary v-button component. See documentation for valid values
props.primaryButtonClose: If true clicking primary button emits @input:secondaryButtonClick event and closes modal. If false modal is not closed after emitting event
props.secondaryButtonClose: If true clicking primary button emits @input:primaryButtonClick event and closes modal. If false modal is not closed after emitting event
props.justifyButtons: Use this prop to place buttons in footer. Valid values are: 'start', 'end', 'center', 'between', 'around', 'evenly'
props.staticBackdrop: If true modal dialog cannot be closed by clicking outside of it
props.noHeader: If true modal dialog cannot be closed by clicking outside of it
props.position: Modal position. Valid values are: 'top', 'center' or 'bottom'
props.size: Modal size. Valid values are: 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl' or 'fit'
props.closeButton: Attributes of v-close-button component. See documentation for valid values
props.transition: Sets animation effect when showing or hiding modal. Valid values are: 'fade', 'fade-slide', 'fade-scale' or `empty string` to disable animations. Animation speed can be set in `--modal-transition-duration` css variable.
props.styleBackdrop: Style of backdrop. Useful mainly for setting tint and opactity for modal background

emits.input:static-backdrop-click: Emmited after clicking backdrop if `static-backdrop` prop is `true`

slots.modal: Swaps the entire default content of v-modal. Slot props: `close()`
